about.description:
A result-oriented Software Engineer with a strong foundation in Java, Spring Boot, and Cloud Technologies.
I specialize in designing scalable backend systems, optimizing development workflows with Docker & CI/CD, and building efficient web applications.

While my core focus is Enterprise Software, I also maintain a strong passion for Game Development, utilizing my C++ and C# skills to create interactive experiences.
